title: unban me riot games
body: ok so i was in a 5man with all of my friends that ive played league with before. none of any of us hate each other and we are not toxic. yesterday i got banned for 14 days due to some "toxic" behavior in a game or something like that. the only things i saw in the chat log that mightve been toxic was when i said "kys" twice. i also disconnected for about 5 minutes because my screen froze while i alt tabbed and i had the restart may computer. ive told all of my friends about this and they didnt mind  as we won the game anyways. i think i do not deserve this ban and i wasnt hurting anybody. i just got into my silver promos and i hope i can grind today after school. my birthday was on sunday btw. please unban me

replies.body: There are certain things that cross the line, telling others to kill themselves in-game being one of them. Friendly banter with your own team is one thing, telling the enemy team to kill themselves is another. Once accounts get permanently banned for something like this it won't be reversed.

The exact same thing happened to me. Send a ticket in, riot should understand. If you are only saying "kys" to your premade friends and not in All Chat then you'll be fine. I got unbanned from it. But if anyone, including the enemy team, reports you, even if you didn't say anything in All-Chat, riot may not notice this at first and ban you thinking you were being toxic. Basically it's wise to just not say anything like that, even to your team, because there can easily be confusion.

Wanted to drop a note here, Divine makes good points here actually ^^^^

Saying it *at all* will likely trigger the system and issue a ban. We're definitely open to talking about these things though, it's just generally smart not to make overly toxic/negative statements like this at all. Even if it's just quoting someone.

yeah i kinda did some research about things that could get me banned and im definitely not saying that again. how do i send tickets in to riot or whatever; i posted here bc i didnt know where else to go to
